Reviews.Title: Like the Camera,  still getting acquainted
Reviews.Author: Michael B. Ryan "gadgetman"
Reviews.Content: Definitely like it.  Takes a while to get used to the EXTENSIVE feature set.  Doing a lot more than my alpha 300.  Totally different experience.  I like all the extra buttons and displays but have to master them.Not a five star yet due to still getting to know the camera.  Have read a 600 page book on this camera and still GETTING to know it.Much better pictures, bokeh better.  Images Sharper, focusing more precise, love the hdr etc.  Have not used the movie side yet.Well worth the money.Only negative is that it is heavy and bulky.Still love the camera after 3 months, taking the best pic I have ever taken.the stuff in the kit is cheap, not worth much so don't buy it for the kit.
